Review Title: I'm Hooked Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Suspicions Of Mr. Whicher: The Murder At Road Hill House Review Date: 2018/08/13 Categories: Suspense, Drama, Emotional, Serious Product Description: ['Inspector Jack Whicher is part of the newly formed Scotland Yard detective department and travels to Rode, Wiltshire, to investigate a murder at a country house. With no material evidence and only an inept local police force to help, he faces the unenviable task of solving a case in which members of the grieving family are the main suspects.'] Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['James Hawes'], 'Producers': ['Nigel Marchant', 'Robert Bullock'], 'Starring': ['Paddy Considine', 'Peter Capaldi', 'Alexandra Roach']} Review Text: Love this series will continue watching Review Title: I'm Hooked Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Suspicions Of Mr. Whicher: The Ties That Bind Review Date: 2018/08/14 Categories: Suspense, International, Serious, Tense Product Description: ["This installment in the Whicher series will examine Whicher's own secret emotional life - explaining the loss of his wife and child - though there will be a more straight-forward mystery in the foreground."] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Geoffrey Sax', 'James Hawes'], 'Producers': ['David Boulter', 'Mark Redhead'], 'Starring': ['Paddy Considine', 'Gwyneth Keyworth', 'Helen Bradbury']} Review Text: I felt as if I were there. I shall wait for more.

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual exhibits a strong preference for suspenseful and dramatic narratives, often indicating a deep emotional engagement with the content. Consistently high ratings suggest a genuine appreciation for high-quality storytelling, with an average rating around 4.6. The use of keywords like "hooked" and "love" reflects sentimentality towards characters and themes of mystery and tension. 

Common themes in their choices highlight an inclination towards serious plots intertwined with personal struggles, particularly the emotional lives of characters. This indicates a favor for stories that delve into human complexity alongside thrilling elements. 

Quality preferences lean towards well-produced content featuring recognized actors and directors, underscoring a desire for reliable production values. Price sensitivity appears moderate, as the individual seems less concerned about cost when content quality is prioritized. 

Ultimately, their core preferences revolve around immersive storytelling that balances suspense with emotional depth, showcasing an affinity for character-driven plots and strong production quality across varied themes.

target_interaction.title: Bogus !!
target_interaction.text:
All these people are the same.. Always at night,bad lighting,far away noises, adding Ghostly characters/Images to the storie. Hello if your having a Haunting it would be 24-7 not just at night... lets be Honest there making a hell of a lot of money on us just watching.. The somewhat entertaining, Yet non Honest made up stories!
I REGRET WASTING TIME WATCHING THIS ONE! THOUGHT IT WAS A MOVIE
